pages.text: “Ujinjilani (ni kupasya kupoteka kwakwe), pililani kapena nkapilila yalumope kukwenu, chisimu nkulipidwa yamwaliji nkupanganya.”
Chisimu wawoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) tachiwa m’Matimbe ga ku Mbepo, ni chindimba
Achiyisengwelaga yawapele M’mbuje gwao (Allah), aku M’mbuje gwao ali wagosile ku ilagasyo ya Moto Waukali
(Tachasalila kuti): “Lyagani soni mwagani mwakusengwa ligongo lya ayila (yambone) yamwaliji nkutenda.”
Ali ajegeme mu itengu yauchimbichimbi yejalidwe chenene, ni tuchalombekasya ni achimmasyeto wameso gakulanguka soni gekulungwa mwakusalalila

Sano awala waakulupilile ni kwaakuuya wanache wao pa chikulupi, chitukasimanganye wanganyao ni wanache wao, soni ngatuja kwapunguchisya (malipilo ga) masengo gao chilichose. Mundu jwalijose tachiwa uwombosi wakuliombolela ku (yakusakala) yawapanganyisye (pakutawidwa ku Moto)
Ni tukaajonjechesyeje (wakulupililao ndawi ni katema) isogosi kwisa soni nyama, mu yataakaisacheje
Takapochelanganeje kwalakweko ipanda (yankologo) wangatendekasya kuwecheta yangali mate namuno yasambi
Ni taakaasyuunguleje wanganyao achiboyi wao (wakwatumichila), gamba kuwa wanganyao (kamelemende kakwe) nti chisawu ngalekale syesunjidwe
Ni tachigalauchilana wane kwa wane achiwusyanaga (yatite kawupate ntendele wa ku Mbepo)
Tachiti: “Chisimu uwwe twaliji kala ku mawasa getu tuli nkogopa (ipotesi ya Allah).”
“Basi Allah atutendele ukoto uwwe ni atugosile ku ilagasyo ya Moto.”
“Chisimu uwwe twaliji kala (ku duniya) tuli nkum’bomba (Jwele Jikape), chisimu Jwalakwe ni Jwambone nnope, Jwachanasa channope.”
Basi kumbusyani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), soni mmwe nganim’ba abimbi kapena wamasoka pa chindimba cha Ambuje wenu (champele, wauli utume)
Kapena wanganyao akutiji: “(Jwalakweju ni) nkwiimba ilaanga, tugamba kun’jembechela kuti chimpate chiwa (yachatite pakwapata akwiimba wane waakala)?”
Jilani: “Jembechelaani, chisimu une none ndinamwe mwa akwembecheya.”
